starter-template.title: About EuskalSense
starter-template.p1: The aim of EuskalSense is to visualize data about air's quality in Basque Country. The data is publicly available from OpenData Euskadi and it is visualized thanks to CartoDB.
starter-template.p2: The source code of Euskalsense is freely available in GitHub, ready for forking ;-)
starter-template.contactText: For any bug or suggestion feel free to open an issue in GitHub or to contact me by e-mail:
starter-template.contactAddress:
Mikel Emaldi
